comments:
Abolished 1.4.1968 and divided between the parishes of Derby, Little 
    Eaton and Quorndon. See also Table 2, notes (h) and (n).

Abolished 25.3.1884 and divided between the parishes of Alvaston 
    & Boulton and Elvaston.

Created 25.3.1884 out of the parishes of Boulton and Alvaston. 
    Abolished 1.4.1968 and divided between the parishes of Derby and Elvaston. See 
    also Table 2, notes (c), (d) and (n).

That part which until 1.4.1935 formed parts of the parishes of 
    Bramcote, Chilwell, Stapleford and Toton. See also Table 2, note (f).

Abolished 25.3.1884 and divided between the parishes of Alvaston 
    & Boulton and Elvaston.

Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Beeston & Stapleford. 
    See also Table 2, note (f).

Abolished 1.4.1968 and divided between the parishes of Derby and 
    Morley. See also Table 2, notes (c), (d), (e) and (n).

Abolished 1.4.1968 and divided between the parishes of Derby, Elvaston, 
    Aston upon Trent and Swarkestone. See also Table 2, note (n).

Abolished 1.4.1935 and divided between the parishes of Beeston 
    & Stapleford and Clifton with Glapton. See also Table 2, note (d).

That part which until 1.4.1935 formed part of the parish of 
    Chilwell, See also Table 2, note (f).

That part which until 9.11.1901 formed parts of the parishes 
    of Alvaston & Boulton, Chaddesden, Normanton, Osmaston and Spondon, See 
    also Table 2, note (c).

That part which until 1.4.1934 formed parts of the parishes of 
    Chaddesden and Spondon. See also Table 2, note (e).

Abolished 1.4.1936 and added to the parish of Long Whatton. 
    See also Table 2, note (j).
Abolished 1.4.1936 and added to the parish of Lockington.

Created 1.4.1936 out of the parishes of Isley Walton, Langley 
    Priory and Castle Donington. See also Table 2, note (j).
Abolished 1.4.1936 and added to the parish of Isley cum Langley.

Abolished 1.4.1934 and divided between the parishes of Ilkeston 
    and Dale Abbey.
Abolished 1.4.1936 and added to the parish of Isley cum Langley.

Abolished 1.4.1968 and divided between the parishes of Derby and 
    Findern. See also Table 2, notes (b), (d) and (n).

That part which until 1.4.1936 formed the parish of Diseworth. 
    See also Table 2, note (j).

Abolished 1.4.1968 and divided between the parishes of Derby, Burnaston, 
    Findern and Radbourne. See also Table 2, notes (k) and (n).

Abolished 1.4.1928 and divided between the parishes of Derby, Sinfin 
    Moor and Littleover. See also Table 2, notes (b), (c) and (d).

Abolished 1.4.1902 and added to the parish of Sinfin Moor. 
    See also Table 2, note (c).

On 25.3.1885 the part in Leicestershire was transfererd to Derbyshire, so that thereafter Sawley with Wilsthorpe 
    was entirely in Derbyshire. Abolished 1.4.1934 and divided between the parishes of Long Eaton and Breaston.

Abolished 1.4.1968 and divided between the parishes of Derby and 
    Barrow upon Trent. See also Table 2, note (n).

Abolished 1.4.1968 and divided between the parishes of Derby, Barrow 
    upon Trent and Swarkestone. See also Table 2, notes (d) and (n).

Abolished 1.4.1968 and divided between the parishes of Derby, Dale 
    Abbey and Ockbrook. See also Table 2, notes (c), (d), (e), (n) and (p).

Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Beeston & Stapleford. 
    See also Table 2, note (f).

Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Beeston & Stapleford. 
    See also Table 2, note (f).
